items.summary: Create 20 new high-quality AI prompt records (English) distributed across the existing backend categories: videoGeneration, photoGeneration, cgiAds, and socialMedia. Each prompt record must include: title, description, fullText, tags[], and boolean flags isPopular, isNew, isPremium.

Persist the 20 new prompts in the canister so they are returned by getAllPrompts and therefore appear in the Prompt Library. The seeding must be idempotent (running it multiple times must not create duplicates) and must not break existing prompt IDs or existing stored prompts.
